mapper.select: SELECT m.match_no , m.match_date ,(select crtroom_name FROM crtroom WHERE crtroom_no = m.crtroom_no) as crtroom_name , (select nick FROM pr WHERE mem_id = mh.mem_id) as opp_match , mh.match_apply_date , mh.wrt_regi_date , FIND_CATEGORY_NAME(mh.match_state) match_state , mhr.MATCH_REP_NO , mhr.REP_CTT FROM match m JOIN match_hist mh ON m.match_no = mh.match_no LEFT OUTER JOIN match_hist_rep mhr ON m.match_no = mhr.match_no where m.mem_id = #{memId} ORDER BY match_hist_no
